book.synopsis: At last brought to the U.S., the best-selling comics adaptation of the great classic of French literature that scandalized the French establishment as reported on the front page of the New York Times! Step back into a world of insightful reflection as Proust is brought back, through the legendary magic of the smell of a madeleine, to his youth in a small town of France.
book.title_long: Remembrance of Things Past: Combray (Remembrance of Things Past)
book.dimensions: Height: 11.25 Inches, Length: 8.75 Inches, Weight: 0.72973008722 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
